[b]Credits:[/b]
Programming:
Astronaronic

Graphics:
Astronaronic
Kenney (kenney.nl)

Font:
Copyright © 2020, Braille Institute of America, Inc., https://www.brailleinstitute.org/freefont with
Reserved Typeface Name Atkinson Hyperlegible Font.
For font EULA, see fonts folder in source files.

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
When the checkbox is checked, the condition `Checked` is verified.
A halo appears when the mouse hovers near the checkbox.

Checkbox cannot be toggled by users if any of these are true:
- Checkbox is hidden
- Checkbox's layer is hidden
- Checkbox is disabled

Checkbox can always be changed by an action.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: Checkbox
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Checkbox that can be toggled by a left-click or touch.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description:
Checkbox can be toggled by a left-click or touch. 

When the checkbox is checked, the condition `Checked` is TRUE.
A halo appears when the mouse hovers near the checkbox.

Checkbox cannot be toggled by users if any of these are true:
- Checkbox is hidden
- Checkbox's layer is hidden
- Checkbox is disabled

Checkbox can always be changed by an action.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: Checkbox

events.comment: Fix inputs that create malformed checkboxes
Change shape painter based on properties
Draw checkbox
Set halo radius, if not specified
Detect hover
Change shape painter for halo
Detect touch/click
Draw halo
Draw left-side of checkmark
Draw right-side of checkmark

eventsFunctions.description: If checked, change to unchecked.  If unchecked, change to checked.
eventsFunctions.name: ToggleChecked
SetHaloRadius
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change halo radius of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetBorderThickness
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change border thickness of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetSideLength
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change side length of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.name: SetLineWidth
eventsFunctions.sentence: Change line width of _PARAM0_ to _PARAM2_ pixels

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the checkbox is checked
eventsFunctions.name: IsChecked

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the checkbox is disabled
eventsFunctions.name: IsDisabled

eventsFunctions.description: Used to draw the outline of the checkbox (when it is unchecked) and the fill color (when checkbox is checked).
eventsFunctions.name: PrimaryColor

eventsFunctions.description: Used to fill the checkbox (when it is unchecked) and to draw the checkmark (when checkbox is checked)
eventsFunctions.name: SecondaryColor

eventsFunctions.description: Opacity of the halo while the checkbox is touched or clicked
eventsFunctions.name: HaloOpacityPressed

eventsFunctions.description: Opacity of the halo when the mouse is hovering near the checkbox
eventsFunctions.name: HaloOpacityHover

propertyDescriptors.label: Checked
propertyDescriptors.name: Checked

propertyDescriptors.label: Primary color of checkbox. (Example: 24;119;211) Fill color when box is checked.
propertyDescriptors.name: PrimaryColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Secondary color of checkbox. (Example: 255;255;255) Color of checkmark when box is checked.
propertyDescriptors.name: SecondaryColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Length of each side (px) Min: 10 Default: 24
propertyDescriptors.name: SideLength

propertyDescriptors.label: Line width of checkmark (px) Min: 1 Max: 1/4 * SideLength Default: 5
propertyDescriptors.name: LineWidth

propertyDescriptors.label: Radius of halo during hover. If blank, this is set to 1.5x the "SideLength".
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloRadius

propertyDescriptors.label: State of the checkbox has changed (Used in "ToggleChecked" function)
propertyDescriptors.name: ToggleChanged

propertyDescriptors.label: Disabled (the checkbox cannot be toggled by user)
propertyDescriptors.name: Disabled

propertyDescriptors.label: Border thickness (px) This border is only visible when the checkbox is unchecked.
propertyDescriptors.name: BorderThickness

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of halo during hover
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloOpacityHover

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of halo while being pressed
propertyDescriptors.name: HaloOpacityPressed

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: Tristan Rhodes (https://victrisgames.itch.io/)
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description:
Add this behavior to a shape painter object.

When the toggle switch is in the *left* position, the condition `Checked` is "false". If it is in the *right* position, the condition `Checked` is true.
A halo appears when the mouse hovers near the toggle switch.

Toggle switch cannot be toggled by users if any of these are true:
- Toggle switch is hidden
- Toggle switch's layer is hidden
- Toggle switch is disabled

Toggle switch can always be changed by an action.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: ToggleSwitch
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: Toggle switch that users can click or touch.

eventsBasedBehaviors.description: Use a shape-painter object to draw a toggle switch that users can click or touch.
eventsBasedBehaviors.name: ToggleSwitch

events.comment: Fix bad inputs that create malformed toggle switches
Animate the thumb to the right place
Set inactive track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw half circle at end (optional)
Draw inactive track
Set active track parameters (by default, use thumb color)
Draw half circle at end (optional)
Draw active track
Detect hover/touch/click (but only if the layer and object is visible, and the object is not already being dragged)
Draw halo when the mouse is hovering over thumb
Detect mouse clicks near track, start dragging
Use darker halo while being pressed
Reset scene variable
Drop Shadow
Prepare thumb settings
Draw Circle thumb
Make sure object gets re-drawn every frame

eventsFunctions.description: If checked, change to unchecked.  If unchecked, change to checked.

eventsFunctions.description: Check if mouse is hovering over toggle switch

events.comment: Set default result
Check position of mouse

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the toggle switch is disabled
eventsFunctions.name: IsDisabled

eventsFunctions.description: Check if the toggle switch is checked
eventsFunctions.name: IsChecked

propertyDescriptors.label: Radius of the thumb (px) Example: 10
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbRadius

propertyDescriptors.label: Active thumb color string. Example:  24;119;211
propertyDescriptors.name: ActiveThumbColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the thumb. Example: 255

propertyDescriptors.label: Width of the track (pixels) Example: 20
propertyDescriptors.name: TrackWidth

propertyDescriptors.label: Height of the track (pixels) Example: 14

propertyDescriptors.name: InactiveTrackColor

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of the track that is RIGHT of the thumb.  Example: 255

propertyDescriptors.name: IsPressed

propertyDescriptors.label: Offset (Y) of shadow on thumb.  Positive numbers move shadow down, negative numbers move shadow up. Example: 4
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbShadowOffsetY

propertyDescriptors.label: Offset (X) of shadow on thumb.  Positive numbers move shadow right, negative numbers move shadow left. Example: 0
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbShadowOffsetX

propertyDescriptors.label: Opacity of shadow on thumb. Example: 32
propertyDescriptors.name: ThumbShadowOpacity

eventsFunctionsExtensions.author: @ddabrahim
eventsFunctionsExtensions.description: An action to move the camera by **dragging** with the mouse (or **scrolling** with the touch), on vertical, horizontal or both directions.
eventsFunctionsExtensions.name: DragCameraWithPointer
eventsFunctionsExtensions.shortDescription: An action to move the camera by dragging with the mouse (or scrolling with the touch), on vertical, horizontal or both directions.

eventsFunctions.name: DragCameraWithPointer
eventsFunctions.sentence: Drag camera _PARAM1_ on layer _PARAM2_ in _PARAM3_ direction with the pointer

events.comment: when mouse button is pressed, get start position of mouse
get direction selected
when mouse button is pressed, get current position of mouse and calculate distance between the previous and current position on X and Y axis
if selected direction is horizontal or both
when mouse button is pressed, move camera on X axis
if direction is vertical or both
when mouse button is pressed, move camera on Y axis

parameters.description: Direction you want to drag the camera. It can be "vertical" or  "horizontal" or "both"
parameters.name: Direction
